title: Ep 9: Quitters Sometimes Win with Priyanka Mattoo
itunes:title: Ep 9: Quitters Sometimes Win with Priyanka Mattoo
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate sit down with producer, writer, and director Priyanka Mattoo (The Homestay), who discusses how her experience dealing with post-partum depression after the birth of her son helped her get serious about her self-care. Priyanka go...
description:
Doree and Kate sit down with producer, writer, and director Priyanka Mattoo (The Homestay), who discusses how her experience dealing with post-partum depression after the birth of her son helped her get serious about her self-care. Priyanka goes through her simple but effective skincare routine, and also shares the Maybelline lip stain she's been wearing for over 10 years. Plus, Doree and Kate celebrate Doree's big news: she quit her job! And Kate grapples with staying politically engaged while not binging on 24-hour news and Twitter.

For more info and a list of products mentioned on this week's episode, visit forever35podcast.com. You can also join the Forever35 Facebook group, follow the podcast on Instagram and Twitter, and send them an email at forever35podcast@gmail.com. And now you can call them and leave a voicemail at 781-591-0390!

This episode is sponsored by ThriveMarket (visit www.thrivemarket.com/forever35 for $60 off, free shipping and a 30-day free trial) , Begins With Skin (visit beginswithskin.com and use code FOREVER35 to get 10% off your first order), and Merge Records (visit mergerecords.com and enter FOREVER35 at checkout to get 20% off your purchase).

Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
